title: Bug...
body: Everytime I want to play some league of legends with my friends I have to constantly restart my laptop because it will never load anything. I click league of legends it starts up but it wont go to the login screen I've waited an hour and it was still loading. I don't know if this is a bug or my computer but I usually have to restart it for something to work, and even then sometimes it doesn't work. For example I've been waiting for about 15 minutes, and still loading. I really don't know what to do, I've tried scanning my computer and I've also tried running as administrator, and I even tried downloading League of legends again.

replies.body: Its not the internet, I can promise you that, I think it has to do with the new client because often times when I have the old one, it works just fine, but I wanted to download the new one again last night, I haven't played since.
